title: Rain World
notes: Runs perfectly, but freezes upon exit.

title: Rain World
notes: Needs PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1, main character is yellow instead of white, controller not working at all, switching from fullscreen to windowed mode glitches drawing boundaries, seems using only CPU which heats it up, GPU doesn't seems to be used at all.

title: Rain World
notes: Yellow character, crashes as the beginning unless using PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1. Very slow performance on cutscenes and main menu, game itself runs fine.

title: Rain World
notes: Game will crash with dxvk so wine3d11 must be enabled -> PROTON_USE_WINED3D11": "1". Performance is comparable to Windows except on the main menu where it slows down.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10 / DRM 3.23.0 / 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
title: Rain World

notes: Runs flawlessly. Performance on par with Windows.
title: Rain World

notes: No crashes were experienced, performance very similar to Windows 10, though the game does not detect a connected gamepad (Xbox 360 and DS4 controllers tested, working w/ other games on my system). The controllers will both work if one uses steam's built-in controller configuration tool to bind buttons to keyboard keys.
title: Rain World
